00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_TABLEMUTATORCOMPLETIONCOUNTER_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_TABLEMUTATORCOMPLETIONCOUNTER_H
00024 
00025 #include "Common/ReferenceCount.h"
00026 #include "Common/Time.h"
00027 
00028 namespace Hypertable {
00029 
00038   class TableMutatorCompletionCounter {
00039   public:
00040     TableMutatorCompletionCounter()
00041       : m_outstanding(0), m_retries(false), m_errors(false), m_done(false) { }
00042 
00043     void set(size_t count) {
00044       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00045       m_outstanding = count;
00046       m_done = (m_outstanding == 0) ? true : false;
00047       m_errors = m_retries = false;
00048     }
00049 
00050     void decrement() {
00051       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00052       HT_ASSERT(m_outstanding);
00053       m_outstanding--;
00054 
00055       if (m_outstanding == 0) {
00056         m_done = true;
00057         m_cond.notify_all();
00058       }
00059     }
00060 
00061     bool wait_for_completion(Timer &timer) {
00062       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00063       boost::xtime expire_time;
00064 
00065       timer.start();
00066 
00067       while (m_outstanding) {
00068         boost::xtime_get(&expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00069         xtime_add_millis(expire_time, timer.remaining());
00070         if (!m_cond.timed_wait(lock, expire_time))
00071           HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "");
00072       }
00073 
00074       return !(m_retries || m_errors);
00075     }
00076 
00077     void set_retries() { m_retries = true; }
00078 
00079     void set_errors() { m_errors = true; }
00080 
00081     bool has_retries() { return m_retries; }
00082 
00083     bool has_errors() { return m_errors; }
00084 
00085     void clear_errors() { m_errors = false; }
00086 
00087     bool is_complete() { return m_done; }
00088 
00089   private:
00090     Mutex m_mutex;
00091     boost::condition m_cond;
00092     size_t m_outstanding;
00093     bool m_retries;
00094     bool m_errors;
00095     bool m_done;
00096   };
00097 
00098 }
00099 
00100 #endif // HYPERTABLE_TABLEMUTATORCOMPLETIONCOUNTER_H
